abstract: Stocks post modest gains as investors process information from large number of company reports.
lead_paragraph: More than 150 companies reported earnings results this week, including Apple, Exxon Mobil and Ford.

headline.main: Market Mostly Higher as Company Earnings Reports Pour In
headline.print_headline: Market Mostly Higher as Company Earnings Reports Pour In

snippet: More than 150 companies reported earnings results this week, including Apple, Exxon Mobil and Ford.
